:mod:`xdoctest.docstr.convert_google_to_numpy`
==============================================

.. py:module:: xdoctest.docstr.convert_google_to_numpy


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   xdoctest.docstr.convert_google_to_numpy.convert_file_docstrings
   xdoctest.docstr.convert_google_to_numpy.google_to_numpy_docstr

.. function:: convert_file_docstrings(path_to_convert, dry=True)

   path_to_convert = ub.expandpath('~/code/networkx/networkx/algorithms/isomorphism/_embeddinghelpers/balanced_sequence.py')


.. function:: google_to_numpy_docstr(docstr)

   Convert a google-style docstring to a numpy-style docstring

   :Parameters: **docstr** (*str*) -- contents of ``func.__doc__`` for some ``func``, assumed
                to be in google-style.

   :returns: numpy style docstring
   :rtype: str


.. function:: main()
